testcase.classname: As an administrator I should be able to delete the visitor puspose record in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: Verify that a DELETE request to `/api/visitorsPurposeDelete` with invalid authorization and `id` returns a
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/visitorsPurposeDelete" path parameters.............passed * The api user prepares a DELETE request to send to the api visitorsPurposeDelete endpoint containing the information 1278..passed * The api user sends a DELETE request, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '403' with the reason phrase Forbidden..passed
